ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Grouping Story / Question
ygData.msgSnippet: The group really does have an impact - and I think dynamics change at different level ranges.  I ve been in tank heavy that kicked butt - and others that ended
ygData.messageBody:
The group really does have an impact - and I think dynamics change at
different level ranges. I've been in tank heavy that kicked butt - and
others that ended having groups run to zone every fourth pull. I remember
an all(?) tank Karnor Moat once - people kept rooting mobs that cast heal -
when I was yelling that I was using charm as crowd control...

Slyde

-----Original Message-----
From: Christopher Sanders [mailto:christopher.sanders@...]
Sent: Tuesday, February 06, 2001 9:03 AM
To: Eqbards (E-mail)
Subject: [eqbards] Grouping Story / Question


Was it the group, or does the charm song make that much of a difference?

I'm amazed...I can't for the life of me figure out what was suddenly so
right about being a bard in a group...and getting that much xp. Hehe...

Atonal the rambler... :)
